channel.title: Utorrent/going public problem
channel.description:
Ok im trying to set up a private server i have a no-ip u torrent and everything, now i can play fine without utorrent and no-ip and i can play with no-ip on, BUT when utorrent and no-ip are on and i run the server i get this error...
[URL=http://img530.imageshack.us/i/errorez.png/][IMG]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/7366/errorez.png[/img][/URL]
Could someone explain to me why this is happening and what i could do to fix it? Thanks, Final.

item.title: Utorrent/going public problem
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

xneonx:

One thing I would do is close u torrent and port forward. It’s really simple to do. If you need any help pm me.

As he said, Also… I’m not so sure if your aloud to give out links in a reply/message but… http://portforward.com/ is your source to find out how to port forward with your router.

Read full topic
